page.title: 10Bus Service.
page.content: The only public transport that goes though Upton Magna is the bus service that comes on Wedesday's Thursday's and Saturday's 10.00 am till 1.00 pm it goes to Wellington on Thursday's and to Shrewsbury on Wedesday's and Saturday's. The bus picks up people where, they want to be picked up,but most people get on at Pelham road. The price of the fare for a return is Â£1.00 and if you only go one way the price is Â£0.60.There's usally 20 people that go on the bus and about 15 people go all the way into Shrewsbury.The bus service has been running through this village for a long time.The company that the bus belongs to is Williamsons motors Shrewsbury.
